name: redux-actions
description: Flux Standard Action utlities for Redux

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:es && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g acdlite/redux-actions
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:acdlite/redux-actions gh-pages --force

author: Andrew Clark <acdlite@me.com>
